alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:44PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pima County through 530 PM MST... At 443 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms 12 miles north of San Isidro, or 20 miles north of Sells, moving west to northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, Three Points, Avra Valley, San Isidro, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West, Valencia West, Picture Rocks, San Pedro, Queens Well, No:ligk, Comobabi, Cababi, South Comobabi, Santa Rosa Ranch, Sil Nakya, San Luis - Sells District, Pan Tak, Rincon and Silver Bell. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 109 and 111, between mile markers 122 and 146, and between mile markers 152 and 162. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
